name: Maribel Acosta
content: Prof. Dr. Maribel Acosta | People | Institut für Neuroinformatik RUB INI Alumni Prof. Dr. Maribel Acosta maribel.acosta@ini.rub.de (+49) 234-32-19612 Prof. Dr. Maribel Acosta Databases and Information Systems Databases and Information Systems maribel.acosta@ini.rub.de (+49) 234-32-19612 About Me Curriculum Vitae Publications Teaching Supervised Theses Blog Projects Research My research lies in the areas of Databases, Semantic Web, and Artificial Intelligence, where I have extensively investigated novel techniques to query Knowledge Graphs efficiently and effectively. More recently, I have studied the application of Machine Learning approaches to solve diverse problems in the management of Knowledge Graphs. Data Engineering and Management Databases Semantic Web Knowledge Representation Applications of Machine Learning Affiliations at the Ruhr-University Bochum Faculty of Computer Science Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence @ RUB (ML&AI) Awards Nomination for Best Paper Award, The ACM Web Conference (WWW), 2022 Top-100 Most Influential Scholars in the field of AI Knowledge Engineering (ranked 17) by Aminer, 2021 Top-100 Most Influential Scholars in the field of AI Knowledge Engineering (ranked 51) by Aminer, 2020 Teaching Excellence Award, Department of Economics and Management, Karlsruhe Institute of Technology, 2020 Best Student Paper Award, Extended Semantic Web Conference (ESWC), 2019 Best Dissertation Award in Informatics, Department of Economics and Management, KIT, 2018 Teaching Excellence Award, Department of Economics and Management, Karlsruhe Institute of Technology, 2017 Nominee for Best Resource Paper Award, International Semantic Web Conference (ISWC), 2017 Best Paper Award, International Workshop on Dataset Profiling and Federated Search for Web Data (PROFILES), 2017 Best Student Paper Award, ACM SIGAI International Conference in Knowledge Capture (K-CAP), 2015 Best Reviewer Award (Research Track), International Semantic Web Conference (ISWC), 2015 Winner of the Challenge for Crowdsourcing for Social Multimedia, Benchmarking Initiative for Multimedia Evaluation (MediaEval), 2013 Best Demo Paper Award, Extended Semantic Web Conference (ESWC), 2012 Honour Recognition of Master Thesis, Computer Science Dept., Universidad Simon Bolivar, 2012 Best B.Sc.
